name: Captain Cone
description:
You've finally broken free from the chamber that you've been held captive in for years, in that time the notorious Dr. Chunk has turned you into a monstrosity resembling an ice cream swirl.

It's time to escape your captors and take back your freedom, are you up for the task?

In this short game you will face brutally hard gameplay, frustration, and will have to learn from your mistakes. Complete all 4 stages to receive a 'Score Card' to screenshot and paste in the 'Hall of Fame' discussion below to see how you did compared to everyone else!

Will you give up like so many that have  gone before you? 

Or will you see it through to the end?

Good Luck!
